wordpressPost.title: BMJ Open publishes first papers; coverage on BBC’s Today, Washington Post …
wordpressPost.content:
BMJ Open has published its first papers. You can visit the site here.

If you are looking for the paper by Bruno et al. on locked-in syndrome, as covered by BBC Radio 4’s Today programme, the BBC News website, the Washington Post, Times of India, etc., you can find it here.
